channel.title: Can't fix
channel.description: Believe me I've been hosting servers before but had to delete everything off of my PC an restore to factory settings due to my idiot brother downloading some virus that couldn't be rid of. I redid everything, but now when I try to log on with my no-ip address the server is offline when I try logging in or registering on server status page. Any suggestions or ideas what might be causing this problem. I would very much like to get back to hosting my server.

item.title: Can't fix
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

  1. Make sure you port forwarded correctly.
  2. Make sure your firewall has an exception for your server port.

Read full topic
